title: TypeError when creating a custom extension
body_html:
Issue description

TypeError when compiling master branch

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "setup.py", line 52, in <module>
    extra_compile_args=extra_compile_args,
  File "/home/carmocca/PyLaia/PyLaia-env/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/ffi/__init__.py", line 179, in 
create_extension
    kwargs['extra_compile_args'] = ['-std=c99'] + kwargs.get('extra_compile_args', [])
TypeError: can only concatenate list (not "dict") to list

Where kwargs.get('extra_compile_args', []) is {'cxx': ['-std=c++11', '-O2', '-fopenmp'], 'nvcc': ['-std=c++11', '-O2', '-ccbin=gcc-4.9']}

System Info

  • PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
  • Build command you used (if compiling from source): python setup.py install
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.4 LTS
  • PyTorch version: 0.5.0a0+1afdc57
  • Python version: 2.7
  • CUDA version: 9.0.176
  • GPU models and configuration: GPU 0: GeForce GTX 1080
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): (Ubuntu 5.4.0-6ubuntu1~16.04.10) 5.4.0 20160609
  • CMake version: version 3.5.1
  • Versions of any other relevant libraries: [pip] 8.1.1

body:
## Issue description

TypeError when compiling master branch

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "setup.py", line 52, in <module>
    extra_compile_args=extra_compile_args,
  File "/home/carmocca/PyLaia/PyLaia-env/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/ffi/__init__.py", line 179, in 
create_extension
    kwargs['extra_compile_args'] = ['-std=c99'] + kwargs.get('extra_compile_args', [])
TypeError: can only concatenate list (not "dict") to list
```

Where `kwargs.get('extra_compile_args', [])` is `{'cxx': ['-std=c++11', '-O2', '-fopenmp'], 'nvcc': ['-std=c++11', '-O2', '-ccbin=gcc-4.9']}`

## System Info

- PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
- Build command you used (if compiling from source): `python setup.py install`
- OS: Ubuntu 16.04.4 LTS
- PyTorch version: 0.5.0a0+1afdc57
- Python version: 2.7
- CUDA version: 9.0.176
- GPU models and configuration: GPU 0: GeForce GTX 1080
- GCC version (if compiling from source): (Ubuntu 5.4.0-6ubuntu1~16.04.10) 5.4.0 20160609
- CMake version: version 3.5.1
- Versions of any other relevant libraries: [pip] 8.1.1
